casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Ernest DRAYTON, Jr. No. 207P08-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mr. Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of NC. Mr. Ernest Drayton, Jr., for Drayton, Ernest, Jr.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 19th of July 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, New Hanover County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
